test.name: Start and Stop Server

kw.name: Start Store Tracker
kw.doc: Starts the Store Tracker server in a separate thread.

kw.name: Start Server
Start Process
kw.doc: Starts a new process on background.
Start the server in a separate process.

kw.name: Send Data
kw.msg: Received POST request with data: {"frames": [{"events": [{"type": "motion", "attributes": {"Event Type": "Enter Line", "geometry_name": "sco 1", "Event End": "Exit Line"}}]}]} Received from server: {"response": "OK"}

kw.name: Check The Man In The Middle Response
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://192.168.30.97:4444/ path_url=/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://192.168.30.97:4444/ status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'BaseHTTP/0.6 Python/3.11.2', 'Date': 'Wed, 22 May 2024 08:15:47 GMT', 'Content-type': 'application/json'} body=Store tracker is running!

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
Check if the server responds to a GET request.

kw.name: Check The Man In The Middle Response with POST request
POST
kw.msg: Received POST request with data: {"frames":[{"events":[{"type":"motion","attributes":{"Event Type":"Enter Line","geometry_name":"sco 1","Event End":"Exit Line"}}]}]}

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Check if the server responds to a POST request.

kw.name: Check Server Response
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://192.168.31.24:3333/ path_url=/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

GET Response : url=http://192.168.31.24:3333/ status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'BaseHTTP/0.6 Python/3.12.3', 'Date': 'Wed, 22 May 2024 08:15:47 GMT', 'Content-type': 'application/json'} body=Store tracker is running!

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.
Check if the server responds to a GET request.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Terminate Process
kw.doc: Stops the process gracefully or forcefully.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.doc: Test to start Store_tracker App and that the server stops after 5 seconds of runtime.
